<<<<<<< HEAD
Don Sebastian, King of Portugal an historical novel in four parts / done out of French by Mr. Ferrand Spence. Dom Sebastian, Roy de Portugal. English. Spence, Ferrand.
[10], 143, 156 p.
Printed for R. Bentley and S. Magnes ..., London : 1683.
Translation by F. Spence of: Dom Sebastian, Roy de Portugal. Parts 2 and 4 each have special t.p. First English ed. Cf. NUC pre-1956. In: Modern novels, vol. 5. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======

Printed for R. Bentley and S. Magnes ..., London : 1683.
Translation by F. Spence of: Dom Sebastian, Roy de Portugal. Parts 2 and 4 each have special t.p. First English ed. Cf. NUC pre-1956. In: Modern novels, vol. 5. Reproduction of original in British Library.
